dialogs.responseText: What!? Don't be so LOUD! We are right next to eachother! My ears!!
Am I okay? Am I okay? Of course I'm okay. Of course I'm okay. I can hear. I can hear it all, you know!
The voice! HIS voice. In the darkness of that bog. He led me where I needed to be! Hehe! All I had to do was listen. I can still hear it. I can still hear. And you, I hear you, too.
